text:
-2-
If station's position needs clarification, please use space below
to do so:
What is station's annual operating budget?
Does this include all salaries? (If not, can you estimate
salary and partial salary amount?)
Include heat and rent? Estimate of this amount?
Can you estimate total capital investment in station(s) to date?
What amount of budget generally comes from each of the following
sources?
Advertising on air
Other advertising (e.g. publications)
Student activities fund
Part of academic department budget
Part of service division budget
Separate item in general budget
Regular grants from nonprofit organizations
Listener contributions
Fund raising activities
Other (specify)
